I am working on creating a modal that will make it easy to generate URLs for integrations (#25976). It will be accessible from the Bots tab in Personal Settings. For that, an icon is to be added -- most probably it would be fa-link.

I am confused about what color should be used for the icon. I think "Steel Blue" hsl(207, 44%, 49%) might be a good choice. But would love to hear if something else can be used.
